author: Johnny Mac
comment: Sadly has to be a single star, as it didn't work.  It said fax was over 20mb limit but was around 8mb. Even subscribed to unlimited,  but it then after that told me I must buy credits.  No way would I spend more. Customer services did reply with decent timeframe and have been polite. App 1 star Customer services 3 stars.

reply.author: Crowded Road Ltd
reply.content: Please email us directly at support@ifaxapp.com so we can immediately help!

comment: This app does not work as it states. I had to send a fax multiple time for the receiver to get it even though I the app said fax delivered. I also could not open faxes received with out extra charge. This was within the one week free trial too. Even when I agreed to the charge because I needed the fax, once I opened it the fax disappeared. I could never retrieve it. I emailed the developer multiple time the response was "App ticket was closed and merged into this request" or "your request is registered as CC on this request." Finally, they sent an email stating they found no problems with the account and they sent a fax without a problem. I return the email restating I can't open the faxes received as I stated in previous emails. They had no suggestions. DEFINITELY NOT WORTH THE TIME OR MONEY.

reply.author: Crowded Road Ltd
reply.content: Please report your issue from the "Contact Support" option within the app so we can quickly resolve.

author: Jimmy Longobardi
comment: I had issue with losing my ifax number but after a few days, they were able to see payment was received and reinstated the subscription. The app it self works fine, it the subscription and the developer receiving payment it the issue.

reply.author: Crowded Road Ltd
reply.content: We have resolved the issue you were facing with your fax number. Feel free to email us at support@ifaxapp.com if you have any queries.

author: Mike Brown
comment: I installed it and as i waited for my download...i read all the horrible  reviews and immediately uninstalled it before even opening the app....as far as im concerned. ...word of mouth is the most popular advertising and there are WAY too many bad reviews on this app for me to even humor you with it. In the real world....your store would be closed down by the BBB. Be a little more transparent with your service and people wont mind paying a REASONABLE price for it.

author: Heather Rix
comment: Terrible! I expected to pay something to send 13 pages, so that's fine. But after I paid $2.99 for the credits the fax said error check number. The number was correct. Another shorter fax went through fine. So I tried to use the "resend" button and after several attempts it prompted me to pay again. So I did and same thing happened. I won't pay a third time, I've just waisted $6 and an hour of my time, now I have to go to Kinko's as this is time sensitive

reply.author: Crowded Road Ltd
reply.content: The credits are refunded back generally if a fax fails. Please email us directly at support@ifaxapp.com so we can immediately help!
